pullrequest.title: Support ABI checking jobs from forks (#44)

content.raw: This actions is interesting. It is pulling from a different repo in top of the osrf/\* repository a given branch. The next command is an `hg up` to the remote repository branch, what could happen if the osrf repository has one branch with the same name than `${SRC_BRANCH}` like `default`?
content.html: This actions is interesting. It is pulling from a different repo in top of the osrf/* repository a given branch. The next command is an hg up to the remote repository branch, what could happen if the osrf repository has one branch with the same name than ${SRC_BRANCH} like default?
